mapper.sql: bt.BookStorage_Id, bt.StorageCount, bt.TotalPrice, bt.StorageTime, bt.Approval,bt.CWApproval,bt.AppName, bt.AppTime, bt.Revoke_AppName, bt.Revoke_AppTime, bt.AddName, bt.UpdateName, bt.UpdateTime, bt.DeleteName, bt.DeleteTime, bt.TimeLiness, bt.Book_Id, bt.Emp_Id
mapper.select:
select
from bookstorage where BookStorage_Id = #{bookstorageId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TimeLiness=0
select ,b.BookName,e.Emp_Name from bookstorage bt inner join book b on b.Book_Id=bt.Book_Id inner join emp e on e.Emp_Id=bt.Emp_Id where bt.TimeLiness=0 order by bt.StorageTime desc
